name: Shadows (itch) (djmick254)
description:
Reach the portal at the end of each level; then escape back to the beginning avoiding ghosts that mirror your past movements!

Made for the Spooky 2D Jam!

Controls:

Move: A/D or Arrows

Jump/Wall-jump: Z or Space

Restart Level: R

All assets expect for the font was made by me within the time frame of the jam. 

Made With:

Engine: Godot

Pixel Art: Piskel

Music: BeepBox

Sounds: BFXR
